name: Coq au Vin Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: We’ve got you, girl. We know that sometimes you want to throw down and make an absolutely show-stopping meal for date night, a dinner party, or even a random Tuesday, but you might not have 24 hours of prep time and a kitchen full of fancy ingredients. That's why we made Coq au Vin – to help you channel your inner Julia Child without all the fuss. Make this classic French stew in 20 minutes using the blend plus chicken, wine (or a non-wine liquid), mushrooms, and one carrot, all in one pot. Too easy!
